channel.title: Need help on error... just read it
channel.description:
ight im using a guys tut on drug dealing, and i got this error, but first, this is wat he says to put in...
shop = 50 @whi@Drug_dealer 6055 1000 2347 1000 946 1000 590 1000 3188 1000 7447 1000
and i did that, an this is the error I got...
Satan's Isle : Second Pk source , is ONLINE ! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 0 @whi@Drug_dealer 6055 1000 2347 1000 946 1000 590 1000 3188 1000 7447 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)
Can anyone help me???
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 10:53:03 PM[/size][hr]OMG someone help me...

item.title: Need help on error... just read it
item.dc:creator: @_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro {S-Unit} Impulse Arrow
item.description:
@_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro wrote:

New source, Or just delete the thing… It won’t work

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on error... just read it

ight im using a guys tut on drug dealing, and i got this error, but first, this is wat he says to put in…
